TopicTitle: My first Minimus and Mun landing screenshots.

Articles.Content:
So I decided to share my first landings on the celestial bodies in the Kerbin system!

Minimus being the first body I landed on, I screenshotted like crazy and squealed like a schoolgirl, nevertheless here is the screenshot.

(Can't find out how to spoiler stuff so.. large images)

Up until then I was just screwing around in the backyard, such as seeing how far I could get into space, even though I followed a tutorial to get there, I was excited as anything.

And of course, the Mun screenshot. Second body I landed on, MUCH harder then Minimus.

again I followed a tutorial but hey, can you blame me?

These times I've been to places like Duna and all that, but these are just some amazing memories c:

*Minmus

Congratulations on your landings!

Been playing the game for ages and still can't spell Minmus right.. lol thanks for telling me
Nice work! I remember the immense feeling of accomplishment when I first set down on the Mun, it's a rare game that can make you feel that
